intro: Sphaeradenia lemaensis, commonly known as the Lema's star sphaera, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Araceae. It is native to Madagascar and is characterized by its unique, star-shaped inflorescence. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers arranged in a spadix, typical of the Araceae family. Its leaves are broad and glossy, often with a prominent midrib. Sphaeradenia lemaensis is typically found in humid, shaded environments within its native habitat.
